languages.text: Переключайтесь между спутниками с помощью стрелок в верхней части инвентаря или кликом [ЛКМ] по портрету персонажа. В описании предметов указано сравнение с аналогичными, уже экипированными предметами выбранного персонажа.

You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.
languages.original_text: Переключайтесь между спутниками с помощью стрелок в верхней части инвентаря или кликом [ЛКМ] по портрету персонажа. В описании предметов указано сравнение с аналогичными, уже экипированными предметами выбранного персонажа.

traits.locale_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

languages.text: 您可以通过物品栏顶端的箭头，或鼠标左键点击角色头像，切换当前的队伍成员。您可以通过物品的描述部分，与角色当前装备的物品进行比较。
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: 您可以通过物品栏顶端的箭头，或鼠标左键点击角色头像，切换当前的队伍成员。您可以通过物品的描述部分，与角色当前装备的物品进行比较。

languages.text: パーティーメンバーの切り替えは、インベントリ画面の上部にある矢印を使うか、キャラクターのポートレートの上で [LMB] をクリックしよう。アイテムの説明には、キャラクターがすでに装備してい類似アイテムとの比較が表示される。
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: パーティーメンバーの切り替えは、インベントリ画面の上部にある矢印を使うか、キャラクターのポートレートの上で [LMB] をクリックしよう。アイテムの説明には、キャラクターがすでに装備してい同類のアイテムとの比較が含まれている。

languages.text: Puedes alternar entre los miembros del grupo usando las flechas de la parte superior de la pantalla del inventario o haciendo clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el retrato de un personaje. Las descripciones de los objetos contienen una comparativa con los objetos de la misma categoría que tenga equipados el personaje.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: Puedes alternar entre los miembros del grupo usando las flechas de la parte superior de la pantalla del inventario o haciendo clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el retrato de un personaje. Las descripciones de los objetos contienen una comparativa con los objetos de la misma categoría que tenga equipados el personaje.

languages.text: Du kannst zwischen den Gruppenmitgliedern wechseln, indem du die Pfeile am oberen Rand des Inventarbildschirms benutzt oder mit [LMB] auf das Porträt eines Charakters klickst. Die Beschreibungen der Gegenstände enthalten Vergleiche mit den entsprechenden Gegenständen, die der Charakter bereits ausgerüstet hat.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst zwischen den Gruppenmitgliedern wechseln, indem du die Pfeile am oberen Rand des Inventarbildschirms benutzt oder mit der [LMB] auf das Porträt eines Charakters klickst. Die Beschreibungen der Gegenstände enthalten Vergleiche mit den entsprechenden Gegenständen, die der Charakter bereits ausgerüstet hat.

languages.text: Pour passer d'un membre du groupe à l'autre, utilisez les flèches en haut de l'écran d'inventaire ou cliquez avec le [BGS] sur le portrait d'un personnage. Les descriptions des objets contiennent des comparaisons avec les objets correspondants dont dispose déjà le personnage.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: Pour passer d'un membre du groupe à l'autre, utilisez les flèches en haut de l'écran d'inventaire ou cliquez avec le [BGS] sur le portrait d'un personnage. Les descriptions des objets contiennent des comparaisons avec les objets correspondants dont dispose déjà le personnage.

languages.text: Envanter ekranının üst kısmındaki okları kullanarak veya bir karakterin portresine sol fare tuşuyla tıklayarak grup üyeleri arasında geçiş yapabilirsin. Eşya açıklamaları, karakter tarafından hâlihazırda kuşanılmış olan ilgili eşyalarla kıyaslamalar da içerir.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members using the arrows at the top of the inventory screen or clicking [LMB] on a character's portrait. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.
